instruction: Search for failed SSH login attempts in the system authentication log

Check if a remote server port is open using Netcat in zero-I/O mode
List all active listening TCP ports and their associated process IDs

Search for failed SSH login attempts in the system authentication log

instruction: Perform a fast, stealthy SYN scan against a target IP to identify open ports without completing the handshake
Listen on port 8080 to debug incoming HTTP requests
List all active listening TCP ports and show the associated process names/IDs

instruction: Perform a stealthy SYN scan against a target subnet to identify open ports and operating systems, saving the output to a file.
Analyze the authentication log to find and count unique IP addresses responsible for failed SSH login attempts.
